actor: Commander Roman, General of the Grand Fleet
text: Welcome back, my friend. I hear you've been isolating yourself from the world of men, what brought you back?
It's good to see you Roman. I've been continuing my "research" on Nouzur. I couldn't make contact with someone who is not from Amaranthinos, to avoid casualties.

actor: Commander Roman, General of the Grand Fleet
text: But if you are back that means something changed?
Sadly, yes. Things were different 5 years ago. The Sorcerer Order wasn't this radical and hot-headed, so I decided to investigate what happened.

actor: Commander Roman, General of the Grand Fleet
text: I get it, you just couldn't let it go like everybody else, could ya?
You know me, my thirst for knowledge is both a gift and a curse. But knowing you is a gift right now.

actor: Commander Roman, General of the Grand Fleet

text: I need to get to Ermir's Volcano, but the Baharuth Empire is still strict about who can enter the Empire. I need an Empire Jewel, but it costs 20.0000 emerald crystals. You wouldn't know where I could get that fortune?

actor: Commander Roman, General of the Grand Fleet
text: You wouldn't believe if I told you I have the job perfect for you. It's about cleansing a nearby a lake, which the locals consider as sacred. No adventurer could do it for 2 years now and it starts to cause other problems in the wild life.
I shall have a look at it then.

actor: Commander Roman, General of the Grand Fleet
text: Always pleasue doing business with you, my friend. Farðu vel, vinur minn!
